p: Secretion levels of pro-inflammatory mediators in the culture medium and BALF were determined by Luminex assay according to the manufactures′ instructions. Multiplex assay kits for determination of human cytokines in the culture medium were purchased from Bio-Rad. Multiplex assay kits for interferons (IFN-β and IFN-λ1) and mouse cytokine detection were purchased from eBioscience.
